An anonymous vet in California see's a flag at half mast and asks the owner why. The owner is a mother of a hot shot crew in California and was flying the flag at half mast in honor of the 19 who lost their lives, so he asks if he could play taps in honor of the crew. This came across my newsfeed on facebook from our local news channel thought I would share it.
